page.title: 20TIMSBURY'S DOMESTIC ANIMALS
page.content: We went around a lot of houses to see if the people kept a pet. Of the people owning a dog,three people had Collies and two people had an Alsation. Most pet rabbits are black and white, or white on its own.Both Tropical fish and Goldfish are very popular. The favourite cat is the Tortoiseshell.Less popular breeds kept were the Ginger,the Burmese,the Brown Tabby,the Silver Tabby and the Grey. Budgerigars are popular,but Canaries are also great favourites. It seems that people's Hamsters,Guinea-Pigs and Gerbils are mostly brown and white. At a farm we visited,they kept cows, chickens,hens,geese,goats and sheep. {By Joanne and Joy. {____________________________________ { WRITTEN BY THE CHILDREN OF CLASS 1, {ST.MARY'S PRIMARY SCHOOL,TIMSBURY, {DURING THE AUTUMN TERM,1985.
